name: ORBIT CRUSHER
description:
UTILIZE YOUR CELESTIAL POWERS TO CRUSH THE COMETS ORBIT! HOW TO PLAY:

Use the mouse to click and drag the energy orbs to the comet’s destination, before the comet gets there.

If done in time the comet unleashes all the orb energy for you to harvest! If not, the comet turns their energy against you, draining your power meter! Keep your power meter from running out to progress and unlock more challenging stages. 

TIPS:

Energy orbs are magnetized by each other. Use it to your advantage to drag multiple orbs at the same time!

But be careful not to hit the red nodes, as they trap nearby orbs and make them hostile against you!
